summary: JJ Abrams’ Appearance on “The Late Late Show” with James Corden News On June 19th, Abrams is set to appear on “The Late Late...
body:
JJ Abrams’ Appearance on “The Late Late Show” with James Corden News

On June 19th, Abrams is set to appear on “The Late Late Show.” While he will likely talk about his various projects, the SW fandom will want to tune in for news of Episode IX. Even with the project heavily guarded from spoilers, it is very likely that Star Wars will be discussed, as Episode IX begins filming in July 2018. Exciting news!

Read more here:  ‘Star Wars: Episode IX’ Director JJ Abrams to Appear on 'The Late Late Show’ This Week

blog.name: d4m3r0n
blog.title: WE ARE THE SPARK
blog.description: Poe the Flyboy / Rp blog / Independent and selective / Pm me or ask me for starters / "As long as there's light, we've got a chance."

summary: Morning Terror (Part 1)
body:
Morning Terror (Part 1)

((just a fanfic wip, let me know what you think! Features angst, regret, PTSD, etc. Could also be a starter!!))


It was midnight. Early morning, even. And Poe, tired as he was, just couldn’t bring himself to actually sleep.

Turning over in his bunk, Poe mulled over the situation, considering his options. Obviously, it wasn’t healthy to be having these kinds of dreams every other night (or more often, as he carefully neglected to admit to himself). He would have to tell the General eventually, or maybe… no, bad idea. Poe was literally the poster child of the Resistance, the everyday man, the worker, that had submitted his life to the fight against the First Order… and he knew it. And with this knowledge came the realization that if he showed any sign of weakness, people would notice. And if they noticed, well, they’d begin to have doubts about themselves too. Their purpose. Their motives. If they were even fit to carry out their duty in this war, to risk lives other than their own, and to lose those lives all because of a mistake… a mistake that couldn’t be undone, no matter how hard you tried. No. Poe clenched his jaw and turned in his bunk again, pushing out the self-loathing. The others had been through enough already. Poe had to remain strong. Surely he could endure something as trivial as nightmares without someone to baby him.

Right?

Gradually, as Poe laid in his covers reflecting, the prospect of getting some rest tonight had faded, and the burden of the responsibility he carried overtook him, leaving him with one final option. Forget all about this encounter with his thoughts and start the day early (very early, it seemed, as Poe checked the clock on the wall of his quarters). Maybe all of this would go away, Poe told himself, if he just got a cold wash in the ‘fresher. He could do it, he affirmed. He’d have dark circles under his eyes, which would be lined with red rims due to his lack of sleep, but he could get through the day. He would do his duties, training new cadets, meeting with the General and Finn to discuss strategy against the First Order, boosting morale, working on an upcoming mission plan with the remaining members of Black Squadron that hadn’t–

Poe stopped himself. “None of it,” he whispered to himself, clenching his left fist around his sheets. After all, if he couldn’t be strong, couldn’t be the flashy, smug, fucking invincible flyboy that everyone saw, then how would the others follow in his footsteps? Some footsteps, Dameron, came the predictable instance of self-doubt, and all Poe could do was shake his head and try to breathe more steadily, while convincing himself that no, he was NOT going to freak out. He sat up.

Poe knew it was coming, but it was stronger, more wild that it had been in his previous episodes. As his feet grazed the edge of the bed, begging to take him to the ‘fresher and awaken him from this hell, exhaustion overtook him, and with a sharp inhale, Poe flopped back down on his bunk. The guilt, the regret, the hatred– it all returned. And with it, so did the terror.

He shuddered, pulling the covers tighter around him, and shut his eyes tight, hoping to wait it out. It didn’t work. The darkness seemed to surround him and, opening his eyes one last time, his vision began to fade to black. So much for starting the day early, Poe quipped to himself, before the exhaustion set in once more and he finally, FINALLY, fell asleep.

blog.name: imaginingyourfandom
blog.title: Imagining Your Fandom
blog.description: I create gif imagines, preferences, oneshots and prompts for most fandoms. REQUESTS: OPEN

summary: "Just hear me out. I like you, hell I think I might even love you. I don’t know why I can’t get you out of my head but you’re...
caption:
“Just hear me out. I like you, hell I think I might even love you. I don’t know why I can’t get you out of my head but you’re all I seem to think about. I can’t train, I can’t work and I can’t sleep without thinking about you.” You spoke breathlessly. 

He looked at you in shock as you spoke. It took him a moment to come out of his trance before he smiled softly, “I’m glad you feel the same way. I can’t seem to stop thinking about you either. You certainly have a way of captivating others.” You blushed slightly as you took in his comment.

Requested By Anonymous

summary: My favourite part of that Hot Take was when OP said, with no apparent sense of irony, that "wilfully ignoring and...
body:
My favourite part of that Hot Take was when OP said, with no apparent sense of irony, that “wilfully ignoring and misinterpreting media content to suit your own opinion and values is morally repugnant”

… in the EXACT SAME POST where they tied themselves in knots for EIGHT whole paragraphs, just to try and explain away Rian and Mark’s plain words re: “romantic tension” and “romantic drama” between reylo.

I mean, talk about wilful misinterpretation 😂

summary: Im not sure if this old news but There are Casting calls for two new characters called Caro and Mara. There is a mara that is...
caption:
Im not sure if this old news but There are Casting calls for two new characters called Caro and Mara. There is a mara that is married to luke in the other star wars universe, comics I think. What could this mean for reylo? 😭😖 pray they aren’t cousins. That’s if this is the same Mara they are casting. Also with Mara being 40-50 and being Luke’s wife maybe that they are looking for, luke was 53 in the last Jedi so that would make sense. I hate this potentially being true because if luke and Mara turn out to be reys parents I will literally die 😰😰

Reylo forever. Plz JJ… let it happen ❤️

summary: Secrets Rey and Kylo have been together since the end of the war, but they kept it a secret, at her insistence. A change in...
body:
Secrets

Rey and Kylo have been together since the end of the war, but they kept it a secret, at her insistence. A change in their lives pushes Rey to finally tell her friends the truth, but it doesn’t go to well.

@sanziene​ wanted a fic based on this gifset of Adam being ridiculous.

reylo, 1700 words

summary:
A poster for Yukon Tavern’s THE LAST JEDI showing.

Here’s my thing. It’s perfectly fine to not like TLJ. It’s perfectly fine to...
caption:
A poster for Yukon Tavern’s THE LAST JEDI showing.

Here’s my thing. It’s perfectly fine to not like TLJ. It’s perfectly fine to not like any movie. But when your dislike evolves into threats, harassment, hate and just pure awful behavior because you feel you feel entitled to something that isn’t isn’t actually yours?

You can forget any amount of respect or dignity you think you have.

reblog.comment:

summary: I was on Wookieepedia because that’s the only way I can write fic for this fandom that at least halfway makes sense and...
body:
I was on Wookieepedia because that’s the only way I can write fic for this fandom that at least halfway makes sense and apparently there were early concepts for Han as a kid for an Episode III cameo and he looks like this:

Amazing.
